Title: Visit Name
Description: Visit name: M - in months, SC - screening visit, LOG - records without visit; #2 or #3 define repated records at the same visit or repeated visit

Title: Visit Month
Description: Numeric visit in months; for visits prior baseline -1, -2 is an order of screening visits

Title: Enrollment Date
Description: Number of months after baseline visit at which Enrollment occurred; negative values indicate Enrollment occurred before baseline

Title: Informed Consent Date
Description: Number of months after baseline visit at which Informed Consent occurred; negative values indicate Informed Consent occurred before baseline

Title: Prodromal Category
Description: At-risk for PD individuals having the same diagnosis as healthy controls with enrollment criterion hyposmia or REM Sleep Behavior Disorder. The rest are Unknown/Not collected as enrollment criterion

Title: Study Arm
Description: Cohort (PD, healthy control, subjects with Scans Without Evidence of Dopaminergic Deficit [SWEDD], Prodromal, Genetic Cohort PD, or Genetic Cohort Unaffected) determined by the inclusion/exclusion criteria established in the study protocol. A given participant's cohort does not change over time, even if the participant develops or is later found to have characteristics of another cohort .
